Meet ANYmal: Energy-Efficient Roller-Walking Robot

Oct 15, 2020

We published the newest work of our roller-walking robot ANYmal and many news articles reported our achievements. You can find the paper here and the Video is available on YouTube. You can find a list of press releases below.
